results.doc_title: [Active] 2025 Consumer Core Operating Model Refinement & High-Level Objectives

goals.description: Modernize legacy monoliths (Bob, API-v2, Intfood) to improve development agility, system performance, and security
Build reliable, high-performing and scalable backend to power HelloFresh's core actions
Enable customers to schedule ad-hoc order deliveries and select meals for those deliveries
Support multiple deliveries scheduled automatically in a week
Implement UX overhaul using food-based 'restaurant'-style approach for total choice implementation
Launch creator platform/marketplace MVP focused on simple, occasion-based boxes for one-off purchases via social media
goals.owner: Lineia Serisma (product strategy), Cole Banning (growth), Melanie Schmidt (project management)

key_results.metric: Lead Time to Change (LTTC) for monoliths
key_results.target: Match or exceed other services performance

key_results.metric: KTLO (Keep The Lights On) workload allocation

in_scope: Modernization of legacy systems (Bob, API-v2, Intfood)
Migration to newer APIs (Plans API instead of subscription API)
deprioritized: Long-term improvements when conflicting with short-term business needs (Project Bolt, Next Day Delivery Activations UK Launch, Free Breakfast for Life)

dependencies: Client alignment to consume newer APIs (Plans API) instead of legacy systems
Target maturity for 2025 establishment based on YP exercise
Pricing strategy coordination with subscription/plans domain
International markets guardrails to mitigate US market dominance in resource allocation

risks.risk: Dual support of legacy and new systems significantly increases KTLO workload beyond allocated resources
risks.mitigation: Prioritize modernization efforts while balancing immediate business needs

risks.risk: Security vulnerabilities (CVEs) that can't be addressed due to legacy architecture
risks.mitigation: Accelerate modernization to enable security updates

risks.risk: Frequent timeline shifts and increased legacy system incidents slow modernization efforts
risks.mitigation: Balance short-term gains with long-term improvements

risks.risk: Poor personalization and menu repeats from current recommendation engine
US market dominance in resource allocation for international markets
risks.mitigation: Establish guardrails with Ian Brooks as delegate for international markets

initiatives: Next Day Delivery Activations UK Launch
